product_name: Columbia Benton Springs Full-Zip Fleece Jacket - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: The Columbia Benton Springs Full-Zip Fleece Jacket in women's plus sizes is a classic-style fleece that takes you from town to trail in comfort. 100% polyester-fleece jacket provides good insulation and dries quickly. Hand-pocket zippers are hidden in side seams for a clean look. High neck provides extra coverage. Drawcord hem lets you seal in warmth.
short_description: The Columbia Benton Springs Full-Zip Fleece Jacket in women's plus sizes is a classic-style fleece that takes you from town to trail in comfort.
